00067 keyboard::keyboard(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00068  : QWidget(parent, name),strString(0)
00069 {
00070  xSEtup();
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 keyboard::~keyboard()
00075 {
00076 }
00077 void keyboard::xSEtup()
00078 {
00079   //DAVID Set Background
00080   pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/KeyBoardBackground.png");
00081   setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00082   pixMask=QBitmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/KeyBoardMask.png");
00083   setMask(pixMask);
00084   resize(pixBackground.size());
00085   InitKey();
00086   upper=false;
00087 }
00088 void keyboard::slotReceiveChar(QString str_char)
00089 {
00090   strString=strString+str_char;
00091   Label->setText(strString);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void keyboard::slotSendString()
00095 {
00096   emit signalString(strString);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void keyboard::slotClearStr()
00100 {
00101  strString=QString();
00102 }
00103 void keyboard::InitKey()
00104 {

00110    key_1->move(KeyPos[0][0]+width*keypos,KeyPos[0][1]);
00111    key_1->show();
00112    key_list.append(key_1);
00113    connect(key_1,SIGNAL(signalSendChar(QString )),this,SLOT(slotReceiveChar(QString )));
00114    keypos++;

00417    Label->resize(400,28);
00418    //Label->setPixmap(pixLabel);
00419    Label->move(88,17);
00420    QFont f( "Helvetica", 16, QFont::Bold );

00422    Label->setAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
00423   // Label->setText("HAHAA");
00424    Label->show();

00426 }
00427 
00428 void keyboard::slotBackSpace()
00429 {
00430  if(!strString.isEmpty())
00431  {
00432    qWarning("BackSpace");
00433    strString.truncate(strString.length()-1);
00434    Label->setText(strString);
00435  }
00436  
00437 }
00438 void keyboard::slotEnter()
00439 {
00440     qWarning("Enter");
00441     emit signalString(strString);
00442     emit signalEnter();
00443     slotClearStr();
00444     
00445 }
00446 
00447 void keyboard::slotChange()
00448 {
00449     qWarning("change");
00450     keyboard_key *indexkey;
00451     //DAVID Change the uppercase/lowercase;
00452     if(upper)
00453     upper=false;
00454     else
00455     upper=true;
00456      
00457     for(indexkey=key_list.first();indexkey;indexkey=key_list.next())
00458     {
00459       indexkey->slotSetCase(upper);
00460     }
00461 }
00462 #include "keyboard.moc"
